content: Can I set user permissions? Ordinary users are not allowed to add new topics in the channel

@TwoDogs2 various permissions are supported in the "organization permissions" settings panel, but I don't think there's a permission for being able to create new topics or not. I'd be curious to hear more about what you're trying to do.
Hi Tim I want to use permission control to prevent ordinary users from creating new topics in the channel
Make adding new topics invisible to ordinary users in channel expansion options

@TwoDogs2: Being able to make new topics is one of the most useful features of Zulip, so it's not clear to me what you're worried about in trying to prevent it. It feels like you're trying to lock the server down far more than you need to.

I don't see us adding such a feature in the future.
